languages.text: "Я жалею о невинных смертях каждый день! Но как могла я не выступить против ереси? Это против всей моей природы!"

traits.locale_text: "Я жалею о невинных смертях каждый день! Но как могла я не выступить против ереси? Это против всей моей природы!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I regret the deaths of innocents every waking moment! But how could I avert my eyes from heresy? That goes against my very nature!"
languages.original_text: "Я жалею о невинных смертях каждый день! Но как могла я не выступить против ереси? Это против всей моей природы!"

traits.locale_text: "I regret the deaths of innocents every waking day! But how could I avert my eyes from heresy? That goes against my very nature!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I regret the deaths of innocents every waking day! But how could I avert my eyes from heresy? That goes against my very nature!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I regret the deaths of innocents every waking day! But how could I avert my eyes from heresy? That goes against my very nature!"

traits.locale_text: "I regret the deaths of innocents every waking day! But how could I avert my eyes from heresy? That goes against my very nature!"

traits.locale_text: "I regret the deaths of innocents every waking moment! But how could I avert my eyes from heresy? That goes against my very nature!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I regret the deaths of innocents every waking moment! But how could I avert my eyes from heresy? That goes against my very nature!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「私は常に、罪のない人々の死を悔やんでいるわ！でも異端から目をそらすことなどできない。それは私の本質に反することだもの！」
languages.original_text: "I regret the deaths of innocents every waking moment! But how could I avert my eyes from heresy? That goes against my very nature!"

traits.locale_text: 「私は常に、罪のない人々の死を悔やんでいるわ！でも異端から目をそらすことなどできない。それは私の本質に反することだもの！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我活着的每一刻，都为杀害了无辜之人懊悔不已！可我怎么可能对异端恶行视若无睹？这违背了我的本性！”
languages.original_text: "I regret the deaths of innocents every waking moment! But how could I avert my eyes from heresy? That goes against my very nature!"

traits.locale_text: “我活着的每一天，都为杀害了无辜之人懊悔不已！可我怎么可能对异端恶行视若无睹？这违背了我的本性！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Lamento la muerte de inocentes cada momento que pasa! ¿Pero cómo iba a mirar para otro lado y hacer caso omiso a la herejía? ¡Va en contra de mi propia naturaleza!».
languages.original_text: "I regret the deaths of innocents every waking moment! But how could I avert my eyes from heresy? That goes against my very nature!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Lamento la muerte de inocentes cada día! ¿Pero cómo iba a mirar para otro lado y hacer caso omiso a la herejía? ¡Va en contra de mi propia naturaleza!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bereue den Tod dieser Unschuldigen in jedem wachen Moment! Aber wie hätte ich meine Augen vor Ketzerei verschließen können? Das widerspricht meiner ganzen Natur!"
languages.original_text: "I regret the deaths of innocents every waking moment! But how could I avert my eyes from heresy? That goes against my very nature!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bereue den Tod dieser Unschuldigen jeden Tag! Aber wie hätte ich meine Augen vor Ketzerei verschließen können? Das widerspricht meiner ganzen Natur!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je regrette la mort des innocents chaque instant que l'Empereur-Dieu fait ! Mais comment aurais-je pu ignorer une telle hérésie ? Cela aurait signifié renier tout ce que je suis ! »
languages.original_text: "I regret the deaths of innocents every waking moment! But how could I avert my eyes from heresy? That goes against my very nature!"

traits.locale_text: « Je regrette la mort des innocents chaque jour que l'Empereur-Dieu fait ! Mais comment aurais-je pu ignorer une telle hérésie ? Ça aurait signifié renier tout ce que je suis ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Masumların ölümüne üzülmediğim tek bir an bile yok! Fakat kâfirliğe nasıl göz yumabilirdim ki? Doğama aykırı bu!"
languages.original_text: "I regret the deaths of innocents every waking moment! But how could I avert my eyes from heresy? That goes against my very nature!"

traits.locale_text: "Masumların ölümüne her nefesimde üzülüyorum! Fakat kâfirliğe nasıl göz yumabilirdim ki? Doğama aykırı bu!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
